body_html:
@gunan I installed MLK on Mac OS (by default in /opt/intel/mkl)
Then I tried to install tensorflow from source with the following configuration parameters:

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/intel/mkl/lib/ ./configure
You have bazel 0.4.5-homebrew installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /Users/vostryakov/projects/env/bin/python]:
Found possible Python library paths:
/Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use. Default is [/Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages]

Using python library path: /Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with MKL support? [y/N] y
MKL support will be enabled for TensorFlow
Do you wish to download MKL LIB from the web? [Y/n] n
Please specify the location where MKL is installed. [Default is /opt/intel/mklml]: /opt/intel/mkl
Darwin is unsupported yet

May be I do something wrong?

body:
@gunan I installed MLK on Mac OS (by default in /opt/intel/mkl)
Then I tried to install tensorflow from source with the following configuration parameters:

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/intel/mkl/lib/ ./configure 
You have bazel 0.4.5-homebrew installed.
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /Users/vostryakov/projects/env/bin/python]: 
Found possible Python library paths:
  /Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Please input the desired Python library path to use.  Default is [/Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages]

Using python library path: /Users/vostryakov/projects/env/lib/python2.7/site-packages
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with MKL support? [y/N] y
MKL support will be enabled for TensorFlow
Do you wish to download MKL LIB from the web? [Y/n] n
Please specify the location where MKL is installed. [Default is /opt/intel/mklml]: /opt/intel/mkl 
**Darwin is unsupported yet**

May be I do something wrong?
